sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Avatar, Button, Row, Col } from 'antd' import PubSub from 'pubsub-js' export default class User extends Component { state = { user: null } componentDidMount() { PubSub.subscribe('showUserInfo', (msg, user) => this.setState({ user })) console.log(this.state.user) } render() { const { user } = this.state if (!user) return null return (
{user.remark}
昵称：{user.name}
{ this.getItemList() }
) } getItemList = () => { const { user } = this.state const itemList = [ { itemName: "地区", itemValue: "江苏 淮安" }, { itemName: "备注", itemValue: user.remark }, { itemName: "昵称", itemValue: user.name }, { itemName: "手机号", itemValue: "183***8888" }, { itemName: "个性签名", itemValue: "我就是帅，你能有什么办法呢" }, ] return itemList.map((item, index) => ( {item.itemName} {item.itemValue} )) } }
